title: the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `Geth/v1.10.25-stable-69568c55/linux-amd64/go1.18.6`
OS & Version: CentOS Linux 7 

#### Expected behaviour
I deployed geth and expected to synchronize the blocks.
Start the command:
```
geth --ignore-legacy-receipts --syncmode=snap --cache=10240 --http --http.addr=0.0.0.0 --port=30303 --http.port=8545 --http.api=admin,personal,eth,net,web3 --http.corsdomain=* --http.vhosts=* --allow-insecure-unlock
```

#### Actual behaviour
After geth is deployed, no blocks are synchronized, with the following prompt. 
`Err ="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available"`

I wonder how to fix this problem

#### Backtrace

````
WARN [09-16|18:26:22.450] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:32934 reqid=1 duration="15.873µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available"
WARN [09-16|18:27:03.787] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:35804 reqid=1 duration="14.897µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available"
WARN [09-16|18:27:08.495] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:49802 reqid=1 duration="16.605µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available"
WARN [09-16|18:27:36.008] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:43914 reqid=1 duration="18.567µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available"
WARN [09-16|18:27:51.978] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:52114 reqid=1 duration="14.737µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available"
WARN [09-16|18:28:33.343] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:52196 reqid=1 duration="22.326µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available"
WARN [09-16|18:29:41.254] Post-merge network, but no beacon client seen. Please launch one to follow the chain!
INFO [09-16|18:29:42.778] Looking for peers                        peercount=2 tried=28 static=0
WARN [09-16|18:29:47.067] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:36494 reqid=1 duration="18.466µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available"
INFO [09-16|18:29:53.106] Looking for peers                        peercount=2 tried=39 static=0
WARN [09-16|18:30:28.602] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:40230 reqid=1 duration="29.488µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available"
WARN [09-16|18:31:11.904] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:35842 reqid=1 duration="15.247µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available"
WARN [09-16|18:31:21.748] Snapshot extension registration failed   peer=0a807721 err="peer connected on snap without compatible eth support"
WARN [09-16|18:31:57.518] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:52696 reqid=1 duration="14.214µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available"
WARN [09-16|18:32:17.820] Dropping unsynced node during sync       id=127ee49d247d6914                                                                                                      conn=dyndial            addr=24.66.116.221:30304 type=besu/v22.7.2/linux-a...
WARN [09-16|18:32:44.354] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:41                                                                                                     298 reqid=1 duration="17.481µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not a                                                                                                     vailable"
WARN [09-16|18:33:27.352] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:44                                                                                                     626 reqid=1 duration="17.706µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not a                                                                                                     vailable"
WARN [09-16|18:33:28.771] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:58                                                                                                     156 reqid=1 duration="18.281µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not a                                                                                                     vailable"
WARN [09-16|18:33:59.020] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.16.1.129:54678 reqid=1 duration="16.588µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available"
````

I've no idea what process you have connected, but `parity_netPeers` is definitely not something that exists in the ethereum specs. I assume it's some ancient proprietary api of Parity (defunkt years ago), but no idea what would be calling it.

The important line is `Post-merge network, but no beacon client seen. Please launch one to follow the chain!`, please see https://twitter.com/peter_szilagyi/status/1570722078990663680
